title: Internal Hot Wallet & Cat Herder Reimbursements - July
body:
The internal hot wallet and the cat herders of the mStableDAO and ProtocolDAO need to be reimbursed from the incurred operational expenses in July.

These expenses include internal tool subscriptions for daily operations of the mStableDAO and ProtocolDAO, as well as the monthly compensation of the cat herder roles.

A total amount of 4,883.42 MTA is required to fully reimburse and compensate the outstanding open debt, and MTA will be sent to the mStable EARN funding address for disbursement, should the vote be successful: 0x437E8C54Db5C66Bb3D80D2FF156e9bfe31a017db

**Should we reimburse the hot wallet and the cat herders with the agreed upon amount of MTA?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
